div.style: display: flex; padding: 20px; height: 10px; width: 570px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: #151515; border-radius: 10px;

p.style: margin: auto; font-size: 28px; line-height: 28px; margin-top: -9px; color: white;

div.style: display: flex; padding: 20px; height: 54px; width: 570px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: #151515; border-radius: 10px;

p.style: margin: auto; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22px; margin-top: -4px; color: white;

div.p: Hello, my name is vexayy and I am a self-taught Java developer. I specialize in Bukkit minecraft plugins development.
